segments.text: Do you know what you're going to do this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to see a movie with a friend of mine . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to see a movie with me and my friend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what movie you're going to watch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know , but was there a certain movie you wanted to see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: None that I can think of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , would you like to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for inviting me , but I think I'll pass .
segments.speaker: S1
